author: mmusich
body:
# Summary of changes in Global Tags
## RunI simulation
- **RunI Ideal scenario** : [81X_mcRun1_design_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun1_design_v2) as [81X_mcRun1_design_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun1_design_v1) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun1_design_v2/81X_mcRun1_design_v1): 
  - Added `HcalFrontEndMapRcd` for Run1 simulation
- **RunI Heavy Ions scenario** : [81X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v2) as [81X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v1) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v2/81X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v1): 
  - Added `HcalFrontEndMapRcd` for Run1 simulation
- **RunI Realistic scenario** : [81X_mcRun1_realistic_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun1_realistic_v2) as [81X_mcRun1_realistic_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun1_realistic_v1) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun1_realistic_v2/81X_mcRun1_realistic_v1): 
  - Added `HcalFrontEndMapRcd` for Run1 simulation
- **RunI Proton-Lead scenario** : [81X_mcRun1_pA_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun1_pA_v2) as [81X_mcRun1_pA_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun1_pA_v1) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun1_pA_v2/81X_mcRun1_pA_v1): 
  - Added `HcalFrontEndMapRcd` for Run1 simulation
## Upgrade
- **PhaseI realistic scenario** : [81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v6](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v6) as [81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v5) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v6/81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v5): 
  - updated Phase-I Tracker Reco geometry (tag "v6" for geometry) as in #15110
- **PhaseI design scenario** : [81X_upgrade2017_design_v6](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_design_v6) as [81X_upgrade2017_design_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_design_v5) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_design_v6/81X_upgrade2017_design_v5): 
  - updated Phase-I Tracker Reco geometry (tag "v6" for geometry) as in #15110
title: Update Run-I Global Tags with FEMapRcd and Phase-I reconstruction Geometry
